query: SELECT instanceId, lockedAt, expiresAt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), expiresAt) as seconds_until_expiry FROM bot_instance_lock WHERE id = 1
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT instanceId, lockedAt, expiresAt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), expiresAt) as seconds_until_expiry FROM bot_instance_lock WHERE id = 1
